title: Top Line SEO Store Review (copy)

steps.title: Start your Top Line SEO Store Review job

stepItems.title: Payment
stepItems.help: It's a one off payment of $1,000, you will not be charged again.

stepItems.title: What website is the work for?
Create a login
stepItems.description: Add a new user to your site admin with the details shown below. Instructions for: Shopify, adding a staff member, Bigcommerce, adding a user.

stepItems.title: Google Webmaster Tools Access
stepItems.description: Does the store have a Google Webmaster Tools account? If yes please share access to luke@thepixelcrowd.com
stepItems.help: This article shows how to share access: https://webmasters.googleblog.com/2012/03/safely-share-access-to-your-site-in.html

stepItems.title: What specific areas you would to be covered within the report?
stepItems.help: This could include adding features to your store, questions about traffic or keywords etc.
stepItems.description: Let the fixer know if there are specific issues relating to your store which you would to be investigated.

stepItems.title: Google Analytics Access
stepItems.help: This article shows how to share access: https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/1009702?hl=en
stepItems.description: Does the store have a Google Analytics account? If yes please share access to luke@thepixelcrowd.com

stepItems.title: Notification Email
stepItems.subject: Full Store Analysis Report Project
stepItems.body: Your Full Store Analysis Report Project is ready to be worked on

stepItems.title: What marketing activities are you currently using to promote the store?
What are your main sources of sales and traffic?
What are your aims for this review of your store?
Kick Off Call
stepItems.description: Would you like to schedule a call to discuss the work before the project is started?
stepItems.help: Please email luke@thepixelcrowd.com to arrange a meeting time and date

stepItems.title: Proposed deadline and initial questions
stepItems.description: The fixer will share a proposed deadline for completion of the review
stepItems.help: Make sure the homepage has a good meta description. The customer has asked for this: {{ step3.stepItem6 }}

stepItems.title: Read through the Full Store Analysis Report and give feedback.
How happy are you with the work?

steps.title: Produce the Full Store Analysis Report document

stepItems.title: The fixer will produce the report and share it with the customer
Arrange a time to run through the report
stepItems.description: Would you like to arrange a time with Luke to run through the report and the findings?
stepItems.help: Please email luke@thepixelcrowd.com to arrange a time and date for a meeting

description:
A Top Line SEO Store Review is a great way to identify changes you could make to help improve your store and help increase sales and SEO. We have completed these reviews for a number of stores and is has given them a lot of ideas to implement and past customers have seen a good return on their investment. This document we will produce for you will be custom to your store, include a lot of actionable suggestions of how you can create new content and market your site to reach new customers and increase your audience via social media etc, all suggestions will help to increase sales. The report will give you a clear list of actions ordered by priority to implement. The review will include the following areas:
  • Mini-SEO audit of technical site elements and setup
  • Google Analytics audit and suggestions for changes
  • Webmaster Tools account audit and suggestions for changes
  • Store features / content review and suggestions
  • Content marketing reviews and idea
SEO is often seen as technical wizardry, the truth is itâ€™s all about making sure search engines understand what your content is about and ensuring that your content can be indexed and considered for search engine rankings. This review will help you understand the SEO challenges that your site may be facing.
